title: "European Commission Delays Decision on Amazon's Acquisition of iRobot"
text: "European Union (EU) antitrust regulators have reportedly put a temporary halt to their investigation into Amazon's $1.7 billion acquisition of robot vacuum cleaner maker iRobot. The European Commission (EC)
source_name: responsible for enforcing competition laws in the European Union
date: delayed its decision on the deal due to the absence of crucial information from the involved companies

title: "Apple launch event
text: Google vs. DOJ: What to watch"
source_name: "Yahoo Finance Live co-host Seana Smith looks ahead and highlights the biggest headlines expected out tomorrow
sentiment: including Apple's (AAPL) annual keynote event featuring the grand reveal of the iPhone 15 and Google's (GOOG
type: GOOGL) legal battle with the Department of Justice over an alleged monopoly on online search."
